name: Welcome Campaign
description: Welcome new users to our platform
message_text: Hello {name}! Welcome to our community. We're excited to have you here.

name: Product Launch

caption: Check out our new product!

name: Follow-up Campaign
message_type: I wanted to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. Do you have any questions?
ab_split_percentages: I {wanted|hope} to follow up on our conversation about {topic}. {Do you have any questions?|Let me know if you need anything!|Feel free to reach out!}

name: Event Invitation
message_text: You're invited to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. RSVP now!
caption: Join us for this amazing event!
spintax_text: You're {invited|welcome} to {event_name} on {event_date} at {event_location}. {RSVP now!|Don't miss it!|Join us!}

name: Thank You Campaign
message_text: Thank you {name} for your {support|help|contribution}! We really appreciate it.
use_ab_testing: Thank you {name} for your {support|help|contribution}! We {really|truly|sincerely} appreciate it.
column42: Thank you campaign for user support
